highlights:
Qualifications:
 Please take note that candidates must have at least 5 years’ of work experience to be considered, You are someone who takes pride in their work;, You are driven to succeed;, You would describe yourself as ambitious;, You are ready to step into the best version of you;, You are energetic;, You are coachable and trainable;, You are highly motivated;, You possess strong interpersonal communication skills;, You speak professional English or are a native speaker;, You are collaborative;, You are resourceful;, You are goal-oriented and focussed;, You are an independent professional and show initiative and strong problem solving skills;, You have a strong desire to lift others up and grow an organization, 
Responsibilities:
 Carry out daily interviews to qualify prospects to receive our biz information, Devote time daily to our suite of personal development products, Actively attend and participate in our weekly Zoom training calls, 
Benefits:
 Profits are from the sale of products so you will be comfortable in a sales environment, The ability to earn up to $8,000 per sale is very possible here
